Package comp303.fivehundred.ai

Interface Summary
IBiddingStrategy Specifies the bid selection behavior.
ICardExchangeStrategy Defines the behavior of exchanging cards in the hand with cards in the widow.
IPlayingStrategy Behavior to decide which card to play.
IRobotPlayer Collects all the behavior necessary to serve as a complete robot player.
 

Class Summary
RandomBiddingStrategy  
RandomCardExchangeStrategy  
RandomPlayingStrategy  
RandomRobot Plays correctly but randomly, i.e., very badly.
TestRandomBiddingStrategy  
TestRandomCardExchangeStrategy  
TestRandomPlayingStrategy  
 

Exception Summary
AIException Represents a bug related to the misuse of an AI class.
